name: Space Ham
description:
Help Taco the pig dash across space in an effort to rescue his friend who was abducted from their farm by evil aliens. A side-scrolling endless runner.

An Unity first time project with a team of 5 people.

Instructions

Press space to go up, but "up" is relative...

Use the mouse to aim and the left mouse button to shoot.

Thank you for playing and have fun!
